title: Fullmetal Alchemist
description: In a world governed by the laws of alchemy, brothers Edward and Alphonse Elric commit the ultimate taboo in an attempt to bring their deceased mother back to life. The failed transmutation costs Edward his left leg and Alphonse his entire body, leaving his soul bound to a suit of armor. Determined to restore what they have lost, the brothers embark on a journey to find the Philosopher’s Stone, confronting military conspiracies, moral dilemmas, and the devastating cost of human ambition along the way.
author: Hiromu Arakawa
